H0.text: What Harvard researcher was well-known for experimenting with LSD. Timothy Leary

H3.text: What Harvard researcher was well-known for experimenting with LSD. SMIÂ²LE

A4.text: He also experimented with lysergic acid diethylamide (LSD), which was also legal in the US at the time.

A5.text: According to Andrew Weil, Leary (who held an untenured teaching appointment) was fired for missing his scheduled lectures, while Alpert (a tenure-track assistant professor) was dismissed for allegedly giving an undergraduate psilocybin in an off-campus apartment.
